field.name: customthemeoptions
field.label: Custom theme options
field.description: The custom theme options are located in /templates/mrdev/index.xml. Feel free to edit. Check Mr.Dev. documentation to know more.

field.name: collapsibleperline
field.label: Items per line overriden
field.description: The current layout might force the items per line number on the 'Pagination' section. Customize or change layout if you want all changes on that option to take effect.
